Hey, dear boy. I'm too old... Hit me, please!
Miiaauu.. yesterday I massacred your dog, stupid cowboy!
Kroaach! Ugh! I'm so ugly bird ! Disggusting !
I'm so young and so hungry! I'm going to eat You!
Ssss Sssss... I'm going to kill you, boy!
IT HURTS!
OH NO!
BINGO!
RELOAD!

/* ************************************************************************* */ /* **************************** HELP SCREEN ****************************** */ /* ************************************************************************* */
ABOUT GAME
Game instructions: Kill all the bandits trying to kill you ;-) Remeber that you've only six bullets in your Smith&Wesson. To reload new magazine use key SPACE or MIDDLE mouse button. Do not shoot innocent people sometimes moving between bandits (they have no gun). It will reduce your score points slightly! Do not kill nor grandmother, cat, vultures or snake, until they not talk to you. If you kill them when talking, it is great points bonus or otherwise great loss. To change graphics quality/improve speed, use small green quarter in top right corner (anytime). Credits: Graphics based on F. Chmelar & Lucky Luke Series (and also Marek R. :-) Music "pickin6.mid" from uknown author & Slavici z Madridu (W. M.) Sounds taken mostly from many old Amiga game modules ;-) Special Cowboy's thanx to following programs: ... "Potrace" by Peter Selinger
(vectorizing BW bitmaps) ... "Sodipodi" by Lauris Kaplinski & others
(colorizing many images) ... "GoldWave" by GoldWave Inc.
(editing sounds) ... "beez::svg bezier animator" by Philippe Elsass
(path based animations) ... "SVG Convertor" by Marek Raida
(merge of all parts together) Author: Marek Raida
December 2003 - February 2004 Based on many and many existing shooting games :-)
